titleStmt.title: An impartial relation of the surrender and delivery of the famous city of Dublin to the French by the late King James with some great and remarkable passages, which happened betwixt Teague O Regan and the English General, at the surrender, &c.
titleStmt.author: W. B.

notesStmt.note: "Licensed May 22d. J. Fraiser. 1690. And entered according to order"
